message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started with a 50/50 offer, I'll try to improve on that!
I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of you, Bob!
You're squeezing, I'll try to squeeze back!
I'll try to find a sweet spot, Bob!
You're getting closer, but I'm not there yet!
I'll try to make a strong push, Bob!
I'm going back to the middle, let's see if you'll take it this time!
